title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU & Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving chains, agents & retrieval pipelines native Ollama support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Drop-in web UI (chat-style interface) for any Ollama model—Docker one-liner.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; sync/async clients, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints—chat, pull, list, delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-powered interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history & shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector & autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU, CUDA, ROCm) with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaEmbedder for production RAG.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that streams Ollama responses with voice output option.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama with CUDA/ROCm variants and NixOS module.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir NIF library for blazing-fast local LLM inference inside Phoenix/LiveView apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama—supports chat, embeddings, streaming and tool calls.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes & Q&A offline.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Rust RAG example using ollama-rs + qdrant to chat with your PDFs offline.
